title: CONCERT: Beethoven Symphony No. 9
place: Choeur de l'Orchestre Symphonique de Gatineau (COSG)
details: Performance of Beethoven 9th Symphony with the COSG, orchestra and soloists

title: CONCERT: Carleton University Choirs
details: Carleton University Choral ensembles' end of year concert. Event open to University community and by invitation

title: CONCERT: Coro Vivo Ottawa
details: Coro Vivo Ottawa's annual spring performance. World premiere of Nibi, commissioned work by Andrew Balfour

title: CONFERENCE: Online Rehearsal techniques
details: Online conference on rehearsal technique and tools in an online envioronment. Sponsored by the ACCM there will be two sessions one in English and one in French

details: Conference on English and French diction for choral conductors in Latin America. Presentation in Spanish as part of Vocal Terra International Choral Festival

details: Online conference on rehearsal technique and tools in an online envioronment. Sponsored by the UNM and Camerata Vocal de Lima as part of the 1st edition of Peru Canta International Choral Festival
